diplomas.name: Expert in study and management of the information system
diplomas.description: During my first and second year at Hitema I was devoted to the confirmation of my technical skills, with an introduction to project management. My last year was focused on IS management and advanced level project management.

diplomas.name: DUT (Technical University Diploma)
diplomas.description: The goal of the formation is to train students who master not only coding and professional skills, but also the communication techniques essential to meet the demands of the market.
targetedSkills: Technical assistance and training corresponding to user needs
